programlisting:
fmt.Println(*userName + " docs:") fmt.Println("")
for _, doc := range result.Documents { fmt.Println(*doc.LatestVersionMetadata.Name) fmt.Println(" Size: ", *doc.LatestVersionMetadata.Size, "(bytes)") fmt.Println(" Last modified:", *doc.LatestVersionMetadata.ModifiedTimestamp) fmt.Println("") }
